message.body: $FB $BA How 5 day MA and MACD  can be used as short term entry exits, study ma/rsi/macd/BB to find support resistance https://www.stockoptionstutorials.com/toptechnicalindicatorsanddivergences/

links.title: top technical indicators and divergences
links.description: Top technical indicators and divergences 1. Moving Averages - can help traders to recognize short term support resistance zones. They can also be used used to find a retracement from a reversal zone. Moving averages also can be used to find trends , entries exits and trailing stops.

messages.body: 12 Monster Stock Market Predictions For The Week of December 3 https://wp.me/p6NqCb-59Y $SPY $RUT $AAPL $AMZN $INTC $NXPI $SMH $JD $BABA $FB

links.title: 12 Monster Stock Market Predictions For The Week of December 3
links.description: Deal or no deal? Overall it sounds like some progress was made over the weekend at the G20 summit between the US and China. But overall from the few pieces I have read, there is plenty of work to be done, and the bulk of the work will be done in the months that follow.
